missing_permissions.title: Missing Permissions
missing_permissions.description: In order to remove the form submitter from this channel, grant me the `Manage Roles` permission.

permission_overwrite_error.title: Something went wrong
permission_overwrite_error.description: An error occurred while trying to overwrite the permissions for this channel.

invalid_configuration.title: Invalid Configuration
invalid_configuration.description: To create private channels you must define a parent channel using {0}

parent_not_found.title: Parent not Found
parent_not_found.description: Looks like the defined parent does not exist anymore

missing_permissions.title: Missing Permissions
missing_permissions.manage_channel: I need the `Manage Channels` permission to create private channels underneath the defined category.
missing_permissions.create_private_threads: I need the `Create Private Threads` permission to create private threads in the defined channel.

user_not_found.title: User not Found
user_not_found.description: The form submitter left the server.

form_not_found.description: Private channels can only be created for existing forms

success.title: Channel Created Successfully
success.description: Head over to {0} to start your conversation with {1}.

something_went_wrong.title: Something went wrong
something_went_wrong.description: An error occurred while creating the channel. Check the permissions and try again or use {0}.

created.title: Private Channel Created
created.description: The private channel was successfully created and can be accessed at {0}

cannot_create.title: Cannot Create Private Channel
cannot_create.description: Something went wrong while creating the private channel. Try to use the button above or use {0}.

initial.title: Private Channel
initial.description: This is a private channel between the server staff and {0}. Use the data below for your conversation.

toggle_member_list.name: Toggle Member List
toggle_member_list.value: To display the member list on the right, click the "Show Member List" icon at the top. This will allow you to see who is able to view your messages.
